name: Refinery
body: ### About The Refinery Platform is a web-based data visualization and analysis system powered by an ISA-Tab-compatible data repository for public and private data sets. Analyses are implemented as Galaxy workflows and executed through the Galaxy API. ### Demo * http://encode-x.med.harvard.edu | This is a site running the Refinery Platform in "repository mode". In repository mode workflows cannot be accessed. ### Project Team The Refinery Platform is a project of the Park Lab at Harvard Medical School in collaboration with the Hide Lab at Harvard School of Public Health. #### Park Lab * Nils Gehlenborg (@ngehlenborg) * Richard Park (@rpark37) * Psalm Haseley (@psm3426) * Peter J Park #### Hide Lab * Ilya Sytchev (@hackdna) * Shannan Ho Sui * Winston Hide ### Contact and Support Please create a ticket in the issue tracker or email us at refinery@hms.harvard.edu.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
